abstract.p: Earthbound Farms offers package of tomatoes that includes red, yellow, orange, purplish and white miniature heirloom tomatoes; photo (S)

block.p: Red, yellow, orange, purplish and white miniature heirloom tomatoes, some as tiny as nicoise olives, others almost the size of a golf ball, are all part of the Earthbound Farms Tomato Fest. The different varieties, which are packed in a clear one-pint container, offer an array of flavors, from sugar-sweet (the golden pears) to tangy (the scarlet minis). They are $3.99 a box at Garden of Eden Markets, 310 Third Avenue (23rd Street), 162 West 23rd Street and 7 East 14th Street.
